abstract.t: Route Flap Damping RFC2439 is a mecanism for BGProute improve the stability and reduce the load of CPU of the core routers. But it has side-effect,so RIPE has not recommended use of Route Flap Damping on RIPE-378 since May 2006. On the other hand,there are some reserch reports to improve RFC2439 such as draft-ymbk-rfd-usable. This documentation describes the survey of current service provider Route Flap Damping implementation.
